section.section:
A person who commits a murder in the first degree is guilty of a felony and on conviction shall be sentenced to:
death;
imprisonment for life without the possibility of parole; or
imprisonment for life.

Unless a sentence of death is imposed in compliance with § 2-202 of this subtitle and Subtitle 3 of this title, or a sentence of imprisonment for life without the possibility of parole is imposed in compliance with § 2-203 of this subtitle and § 2-304 of this title, the sentence shall be imprisonment for life.
